params._memo: The memo to use when this contract forwards a payment to a terminal.
params._projectId: The ID of the project to pay when this contract receives funds.
params._terminalDirectory: A directory of a project's current Juicebox terminal to receive payments in.

memo().notice: The memo to use when this contract forwards a payment to a terminal.

projectId().notice: The ID of the project to pay when this contract receives funds.

terminalDirectory().notice: The directory to use when resolving which terminal to send the payment to.

userdoc.notice: A contract that can receive funds directly and forward to a project's current terminal.
